task:
Using the kidney Xenium dataset with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), subset the AnnData to cells where adata.obs['CN'] equals 'CN5: Collecting Duct Niche'. Then cluster the cells into 3 subclusters and assign labels using the exact vocabulary: PC, ICA, ICB. Use the following marker genes to guide labeling (higher expression in the indicated subtype vs others):

PC: Aqp2
ICA: Atp6v1b1, Slc4a1
ICB: Slc26a4

Then report the distribution of these CD subtypes as percentages of total CD cells. Percentages should sum to ~100%. Include any missing subtypes with 0%.

Vocabulary: PC, ICA, ICB

cell_type_percentages.description: Each cell type percentage must be within Â±3% of ground truth
